lead_paragraph: A high school girls playoff game between Elmont and Hicksville came to a sudden and tragic end when Gregg Petrocelli, the 38-year-old Elmont coach, collapsed on the sideline and later died.
snippet: A high school girls playoff game between Elmont and Hicksville came to a sudden and tragic end when Gregg Petrocelli, the 38-year-old Elmont coach, collapsed on the sideline and later died.
